snippet: Gen. John R. Allen is under investigation for “inappropriate communication” with Jill Kelley, the Tampa, Fla., woman linked to the Petraeus affair.
abstract: Gen John R Allen, top American and NATO commander in Afghanistan, has come under investigation for alleged inappropriate communication with Jill Kelley, Tampa, Fla, woman whose complaint to FBI set off scandal involving David H Petraeus's extramarital affair.

byline.original: By ERIC SCHMITT and ELISABETH BUMILLER
byline.contributor: Eric Schmitt reported from Washington, and Elisabeth Bumiller from Perth, Australia. Matt Rosenberg, Thom Shanker and Ron Nixon contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Gen. John R. Allen is under investigation for “inappropriate communication” with Jill Kelley, the Tampa, Fla., woman linked to the Petraeus affair.

headline.main: Another General Is Tied to the Petraeus Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Another General Is Tied to the Petraeus Inquiry
